backstories.clan_founder: This dragonet is one of the founding members of the Flock.
backstories.clanborn: This dragonet was born into the Flock where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} currently {VERB/m_c/reside/resides}.
backstories.halfclan1: This dragonet was born into the Flock, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents resides in another Flock.
backstories.halfclan2: This dragonet was born in another Flock, but chose to come to this Flock to be with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} other parent.
backstories.outsider_roots1: This dragonet was born into the Flock, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents is an outsider that belongs to no Flock.
backstories.outsider_roots2: This dragonet was born outside the Flock, but came to live in the Flock with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent at a young age.
backstories.loner1: This dragonet joined the Flock by choice after living life as a loner.
backstories.loner2: This dragonet used to live in a city, but mostly stayed away from Kymari. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} decided Flock life might be an interesting change of pace.
backstories.loner3: m_c wandered the world, aimless and free, but always alone.
backstories.loner4: m_c wandered the world, aimless and free, but always alone - until {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found someone worth staying for.
backstories.kittypet1: This dragonet joined the Flock by choice after living life with Kymari as a bond animal.
backstories.kittypet2: This dragonet used to live on something called a 'boat' with Kymari, but decided to join the Flock.
backstories.kittypet3: This dragonet used to hunt sicora. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} got lost exploring, and when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} returned home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Kymari were gone. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the Clan.
backstories.kittypet4: This dragonet used to hunt sicora. One day, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} decided they wanted to live free, and {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Kymari brought {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to the flock's borders.
backstories.rogue1: This dragonet joined the Flock by choice after living life as a rogue.
backstories.rogue2: This dragonet used to live in a city, scrounging for what {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could find. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} thought the Flock might offer {PRONOUN/m_c/object} more security.
backstories.rogue3: This dragonet used to live alone in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own territory, but was chased out by something and eventually found the Flock.
backstories.abandoned1: This dragonet was found by the Flock as a hatchling and has been living with them ever since.
backstories.abandoned2: This dragonet was born outside of the Flock, but was brought to the Flock as a hatchling and has lived here ever since.
backstories.abandoned3: This dragonet was born into another Flock, but {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} left here as a hatchling for the Flock to raise.
backstories.abandoned4: This dragonet was found and taken in after getting lost as a hatchling.
backstories.otherclan1: This dragonet was born into another Flock, but came to this Flock by choice.
backstories.otherclan2: This dragonet was unhappy in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Flock and decided to come here instead.
backstories.otherclan3: This dragonet's Flock stayed with the Flock after a disaster struck {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old one, and decided to stay after the rest of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Flock returned home.
backstories.otherclan4: This dragonet grew up in another Flock, but chose to leave that life and join the Flock {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} now {VERB/m_c/live/lives} in.
backstories.otherclan5: This dragonet was stolen from a rival Flock to be raised in the Flock {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} now {VERB/m_c/live/lives} in.
backstories.disgraced1: This dragonet was cast out of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Flock for some transgression that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} not keen on talking about.
backstories.disgraced2: This dragonet was exiled from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Flock for something {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} didn't do and came here to seek safety.
backstories.disgraced3: This dragonet once held a high rank in another Flock but was exiled for reasons {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/refuse/refuses} to share.
backstories.retired_leader: This dragonet used to be the leader of another Flock before deciding {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} needed a change of scenery after leadership became too much. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} returned {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nine lives and let {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} deputy take over before coming here.
backstories.medicine_cat: This dragonet was once a cleric in another Flock.
backstories.ostracized_warrior: This dragonet was ostracized from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Flock, but no one really knows why.
backstories.refugee1: This dragonet came to this Flock after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former Flock and the tyrannical leader that had taken over.
backstories.refugee2: This dragonet used to live as a loner, but after another dragonet chased {PRONOUN/m_c/object} from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} took refuge in the Flock.
backstories.refugee3: This dragonet used to be bonded, but joined the Flock after a too-close call with a sicora
backstories.refugee4: This dragonet used to be in a rogue group, but joined the Flock after fleeing from the group's tyrannical leader.
backstories.refugee5: This dragonet got washed away from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former territory in a flood that destroyed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home but was glad to find a new home in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new Flock here.
backstories.refugee6: This dragonet used to be a sicora hunter, but joined the Flock upon escaping being kidnapped from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Kymari.
backstories.tragedy_survivor1: Something horrible happened to this dragonet's previous Flock. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} refuse to speak about it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor2: This dragonet used to be part of a rogue group, but joined the Flock after something terrible happened to it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor3: This dragonet used to be bonded, but joined the Flock after something terrible happened to {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Kymari.
backstories.tragedy_survivor4: This dragonet used to be a loner, but joined the Flock after something terrible made {PRONOUN/m_c/object} leave {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old home behind.
backstories.wandering_healer1: This dragonet used to wander, helping those where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could, and eventually found the Flock.
backstories.wandering_healer2: This dragonet used to live in a specific spot, offering help to all who wandered by, but eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the Flock.
backstories.guided1: This dragonet used to be bonded, but after dreaming of star-scaled dragonets, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} followed their whispers to the Flock.
backstories.guided2: This dragonet used to live a rough life as a rogue. While wandering, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} saw a sparkle of wingbeats, and followed them to the Flock.
backstories.guided3: This dragonet used to live as a loner. A star-scaled dragonet appeared to {PRONOUN/m_c/object} one day, and then led {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to the Flock.
backstories.guided4: This dragonet used to live in a different Flock, until a sign from the Eternal Singers told {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to leave.
backstories.orphaned1: This dragonet was found with a deceased parent. The Flock took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't hide where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} came from.
backstories.orphaned2: This dragonet was found with a deceased parent. The Flock took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't tell {PRONOUN/m_c/object} where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} really came from.
backstories.orphaned3: This dragonet was found as a hatchling among the wreckage of a shuttle with no parents in sight and got brought to live in the Flock.
backstories.orphaned4: This dragonet was found as a hatchling hiding near a place of battle where there were no survivors and got brought to live in the Flock.
backstories.orphaned5: This dragonet was found as a hatchling hiding near {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent's bodies and got brought to live in the Flock.
backstories.orphaned6: This dragonet was found flailing in the ocean as a teeny hatchling, no parent in sight.
backstories.outsider1: This dragonet was born outside of a Flock.
backstories.outsider2: This dragonet was born outside of a Flock, but at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} birth one parent was a member of a Flock.
backstories.outsider3: This dragonet was born outside of a Flock, while {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent was lost.
